name: José Barros
description: '''José Benito Barros''' or simply '''José Barros''' (March 21, 1915 – May 12, 2007) was a [[Colombian people|Colombian]] musician and composer. He composed more than 800 songs in genres including [[cumbia]], [[porro]], [[merengue (music)|merengue]], [[currulao]], [[Paseo music|paseo]], [[bolero]] and [[tango music|tango]].
